properties.description: Enforce NSG to have a rule that denys all inbound traffic in Vnet. Ensures all subnets to have an matching NSG with their Vnet in name associated

nonComplianceMessages.message: NSG must contain a deny vNet Inbound Traffic Rule and a correct name
nonComplianceMessages.policyDefinitionReferenceId: Deny Network Security Groups without default deny rule

nonComplianceMessages.message: NSG must be associated with the subnet with the same name as the vNet it is associated with
nonComplianceMessages.policyDefinitionReferenceId: Allow only Subnets with NSGs and correct names

nonComplianceMessages.message: vNet must be prefixed with 'vnet-', followed by the address space delimited by '-' and suffixed with the region. EG: vnet-10-0-0-0-16-eastus2
vNet must use the firewall IP as the primary DNS server
nonComplianceMessages.policyDefinitionReferenceId: Allow only subnets with one DNS server matching the Firewall's IP address
